meanings.definition: To smile more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She outsmiled her friend during the game.
meanings.sent2: The little girl outsmiled everyone in the room with her bright smile.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy outsmiled the grumpy cat, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her radiant smile outsmiled the sun on that beautiful day.
meanings.sent5: His genuine smile outsmiled any fake ones around.

meanings.sent1: He outsmiled his competition in the smiling contest.
meanings.sent2: The cheerful boy outsmiled even the happiest clown at the party.
meanings.sent3: The sunflower outsmiled the other flowers in the garden with its big, bright face.
meanings.sent4: Her joy outsmiled any sadness that tried to linger.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's laughter outsmiled the gloomy clouds above.
